name: Question 1
content:
[{"type":"markdown","value":"Ek list mein appke paas `marks` hain. Inn marks ka sum kar ke total marks nikalne ka code likha hua hai, lekin yeh code chalta nahi hai. Sahi kar ke submit karo. "},{"type":"python","value":{"code":"marks = ["10", "32", "42", "65", "67", "89", "76", "38", "67"]
total_marks = 0
counter = 0
while counter < len(marks):
    total_marks = total_marks + marks[counter]
    counter = counter + 1","testCases":[]}},{"type":"markdown","value":"Sahi code ko ek file mein save kar ke upload karo. "}]
